ai.desc: The fight always begins with #wCharge #wUp and cycles as #wCharge #wUp -> #wFierce #wBash -> #wVent #wSteam -> #wWhirlwind. If enough damage is applied to satisfy the breakpoint, Guardian instantly gains #b20 #bBlock as it enters defensive mode, where it performs #wClose #wUp -> #wRoll #wAttack -> #wTwin #wSlam. After using #wTwin #wSlam in defensive mode, it re-enters the offensive cycle with #wWhirlwind.
ai.notes: The breakpoints for entering defensive mode are after receiving 30 + ( 10 * #rX ) damage, where #rX is the number of transitions that have occurred. #uSharp #uHide is not the same effect as thorns as it only fires one time after a multi-hit attack.

Always starts with #wStab. Then, has a 25% chance of using #wEntangle until it is used. If #wEntangle has not been used yet, cycles in the order of #wScrape -> #wScrape -> #wStab. Otherwise, has a 45% chance of #wStab and 55% chance of #wScrape, except neither #wStab nor #wScrape can be used three times in a row.

Every 4 turns, uses #wTaunt. Otherwise, approximately 45-25-15-15 probability split between #wHeavy #wSlash - #wFace #wSlap - #wDefensive #wStance - #wGloat. No move can be used twice in a row, and #wDefensive #wStance cannot be used more than two times total. When attempting to use an invalid move, will use the next move in the order of #wDefensive #wStance -> #wGloat -> #wFace #wSlap -> #wHeavy #wSlash -> #wFace #wSlap (which complicates the probability distribution). NL NL After dropping below 50% HP, the Champ will use #wAnger. Then, next turn and every three turns thereafter, uses #wExecute. In between the #wExecute moves, follows the original rules and probabilities of the pre-enraged state.
ai.notes: Will enrage once dropped beneath 50% hp.
